channel.title: Comments on: New Year, New Look
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jenny
item.dc:creator: Jenny
item.description:
It's all...new and different.....*runs and hides*
Okay, not really. I'm just one of those people that adjust slowly to change. :) It looks good though.
